meanings.definition: Very long in length or duration.
meanings.sent1: The snake was superlong, stretching across the entire yard.
meanings.sent2: The line at the amusement park was superlong, but we waited patiently.
meanings.sent3: The superlong scarf wrapped around the tree and looked like a giant snake.
meanings.sent4: Her superlong hair flowed down her back like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The superlong journey through the forest felt never-ending.

meanings.sent1: The movie was superlong, lasting well into the night.
meanings.sent2: The superlong bridge connected the two cities seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: The superlong line at the grocery store made everyone groan.
meanings.sent4: His superlong speech bored the audience to tears.
meanings.sent5: The superlong shadows cast by the setting sun painted the street in golden hues.
